## About

**Hello!** is the personalized homepage for [hello.bkahlert.com][hello-web].

## Development

### Project structure

The Gradle project at the root of this repository is an umbrella project.  
It includes the following projects as [included builds][gradle-include-build] 
(based on [Build organization](https://docs.gradle.org/current/samples/index.html#build_organization)):

#### Infrastructure
- [build-logic](build-logic) â€¦ custom build logic 
- [platforms](platforms) â€¦ dependency management

#### Libraries
- [libs/kommons-libs](libs/kommons-libs) â€¦ library modules that might potentially be extracted to [Kommons][kommons] 
- [libs/hello-libs](libs/hello-libs) â€¦ library modules that are specific to this project

#### Backend
- [aws-cdk](aws-cdk) â€¦ [AWS CDK][aws-cdk] module to automatically deploy to [Amazon Web Services][aws]
- [aws-lambdas](aws-lambdas) â€¦ [AWS Lambda][aws-lambda] modules

#### Web applications
- [apps/playground-app](apps/playground-app) â€¦ application for prototyping
- [apps/test-app](apps/test-app) â€¦ minimal [Fritz2][fritz2] application
- [apps/web-app](apps/web-app) â€¦ Hello! web application

### Cheat sheet

#### Re-build everything

Gradle's `base` plugin is applied to every included build
and the umbrella project.
Therefor the tasks `assemble`, `build`, `clean`, and `check`
work as expectâ€”also in the umbrella project.

```shell
./gradlew clean build
```

If things seem strange, especially the behavior of your IDE,
try:

```shell
./fix-issues
```

#### Update Gradle wrapper

As this is a composite build, all Gradle wrappers should be updated.

Otherwise, tasks started from inside an included build might find plugins
previously built by another Gradle wrapper with a different version.
This can lead to problems if the two Gradle versions make use of a different
Kotlin DSL.

```shell
./gradle-deep wrapper --gradle-version 8.0-rc-1 
```

> ðŸ’¡`gradle-deep` can be found at the root of this repo. It invokes `gradle`
> with the same passed arguments in each root project directory.

## Contributing

Want to contribute?
Awesome!
The most basic way to show your support is to star the project or to raise issues.
You can also support this project by making a [PayPal donation](https://www.paypal.me/bkahlert) to ensure this journey continues indefinitely!

Thanks again for your support, it's much appreciated! :pray:
